name: AMERICAN BEVERAGE ASSOCIATION
description: Association of producers, marketers, and distributors of non-alcoholic beverages
sampleDescriptions: Monitor and discuss Section 232 tariffs on aluminum and impact on end-users.

Monitor potential initiatives to impose a tax on sugar-sweetened beverages.
